content: After resting at the Forest of Ferocity Shrine, you'll see a group of Daoists off to the right practicing, with more voices coming from somewhere further up.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Forest of Ferocity'.
The content is as follows:
After resting at the Forest of Ferocity Shrine, you'll see a group of Daoists off to the right practicing, with more voices coming from somewhere further up.
